title: There's nothing bigger than what we're about to come into - McCullum
text: There's nothing bigger than what we're about to come into - McCullum. Video, 00:02:53There's nothing bigger than what we're about to come into - McCullum
summary: England head coach Brendon McCullum says "there's nothing bigger" than the Ashes and that his side come to Australia "with huge hopes and aspirations".
